snippet.title: MOVIE NIGHT | NEW HORROR GAME OUT NOW
snippet.description:
Amanda thought she would have a relaxing evening watching a movie. Her night suddenly takes an unexpected turn, and Amandas Life will never be the same again. 


GAME LINK: https://jflyer45.itch.io/movie-night

I Teamed up with the legendary Jflyer Games (Creator of the Lancaster Leak Series) for this brand new short Horror game! We've been working hard on it for the past year, and now its finally here! The game is completely Free to play! 

This will be the first project from my new Studio: Voices In The Dark! 

Have fun playing our game! And remember: not 
everything is as it appears... 

JOIN MY PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/DylInTheDark?utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator
MERCH: https://tordyl-studios-2.creator-spring.com/

#indiegame #wholesomehorror #scarygaming #horrorgaming #itchio #itchiohorrorgame #pc #pcgaming #thelancasterleak #gaming
